name: Among The Stars (itch) (laynel2)
description:
My take on an endless runner. You play as an Astronaut stuck out in the stars. See how long you can survive for.

The Game functions and looks much better on the pc however the webgl does give you a pretty good idea how the game works.

Thank you for playing my game, I hope you have fun!

P.S The Leaderboard is being fixed right now it needs SSL to work in itch's hosting
